title: Regency Candlelit Christmas (The MacLerie Clan #4.5)
description:
Christmas Wedding Wish by Julia JustissDisenchanted with empty-headed debutantes, dashing gentleman Allen Mansfell is instantly attracted to the spirited and intelligent Miss Meredyth Wellingford. Merry doesn't believe she’ll ever find true love – but it’s the season of miracles...
The Rake's Secret Son by Annie Burrows
Before Carleton Tillotson left Nell, the rebellious rake broke her heart. Now he's back, just in time for Christmas, and Nell can't hide her secret any longer - Carleton's the father of her son!
Blame It on the Mistletoe by Terri Brisbin
Julia Fairchild has loved Iain MacLerie forever, but the boy she once knew is now a hardened and aloof man. Amid the warm cheer of Christmas, can Julia find a way to turn the spark between them into an enduring flame?
author: Julia Justiss
